review: I got this so the Darling Bride could stream our Prime Instant videos. An added benefit are the apps. For example, we got a fireplace app that looks and sounds phenomenal on our 65" UHD 3DTV.The only things I would have added to improve this device are: (1) UHD 4K support; (2) 3D support; and (3) HDMI input for pass-through. As it is, I can't connect our Satellite input through the Fire TV... so both have to have their own inputs to the TV. If Fire TV had pass-through, I could connect the Satellite to the Fire TV and then the Fire TV to the TV, giving me the ability to watch either without switching inputs.As-is, though, it's a capable streaming device, especially if you have Prime Video.
author: The_Chief
